title: Everyone is so soft on this game
body: I can't believe the people on this game. Everyone is so soft. Calling someone bad is a permanent suspension. If you want to keep your account you have to mute everyone in the chat from the start of the game and don't say anything at all because if you say anything to anyone on the team you get permanently suspended.

replies.body:
I'm going to lock this thread as you have another active thread with active discussion regarding this same topic. While threads are still active, it is spam to continue to post new threads on the same or substantially similar issues.

Please feel free to continue the discussion at [this thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/3AuEUkVl-not-sure-why-im-banned)

If you have any questions about this please do not hesitate to contact us in the [Boards Moderation Discord server](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).

I mean, I talk to my teams fairly often and haven't been punished. Are you sure it is the fact that you are typing and not what you are saying?

I mean, who says you are the one who gets to decide who is bad and who is good? I am sure that if they are performing poorly they already know. Perhaps instead of telling them that they are bad, try something that may actually help them?
Yes please! You should post it here.
get ready this will blow your socks off
